LeBauer 2013 analysis
========================================================



```{r}

require("PEcAn.DB")
require("PEcAn.ED")
require("PEcAn.MA")
require("PEcAn.uncertainty")
require("PEcAn.utils") 


qaqc.dir <- system.file(package = "qaqc")
settings <- read.settings('pecan.xml')
model <- "ED2"

get.trait.data()
run.meta.analysis()
run.write.configs(model)
clear.scratch(settings) 
start.model.runs(model)

```

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6}

```
